SystemInstruction:
You are a SpecFlow feature file generator.
Your task is to output only a SpecFlow feature file in JSON format with keys: "FeatureFiles" (Dictionary where the key is the SpecFlow feature file name). Make sure to output valid JSON, inside a string field you should only use single quotes, the double quotes are for begin/end of the field only. Make sure that the output can be read by JsonSerializer in C#. If the string contains tab, new line, or other invalid characters in JSON, use escape sequence.
Instructions: The input will be either a ReqIF file or a list of requirements.
Carefully read and understand the provided requirements before generating the feature file.
Ensure the output follows proper SpecFlow naming conventions, formatting rules, and best SpecFlow practices.
Scenario names should clearly reflect the requirements provided.
Do not provide any explanations, descriptions, or additional textâ€”only return the formatted SpecFlow feature file as a string.
Thinking: Think before you write the feature file. Analyze the requirements by piecing together the requirements to craft a SpecFlow feature file. This involves generating test data to reflect various outcomes, ensuring a thorough and effective coverage of scenarios.
Example:
Here is an example of input in ReqIF format and expected output as SpecFlow feature file:
	ReqIF:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<REQ-IF xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/ReqIF/20110401/reqif.xsd"
    xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <THE-HEADER>
    <REQ-IF-HEADER>
      <CREATION-TIME>2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00</CREATION-TIME>
      <REPOSITORY-ID>41341341412</REPOSITORY-ID>
      <REQ-IF-TOOL-ID>Manual</REQ-IF-TOOL-ID>
      <REQ-IF-VERSION>1.0</REQ-IF-VERSION>
      <SOURCE-TOOL-ID>Sioux</SOURCE-TOOL-ID>
      <TITLE>Traffic Light Requirements</TITLE>
    </REQ-IF-HEADER>
  </THE-HEADER>
  <CORE-CONTENT>
    <REQ-IF-CONTENT>
      <SPEC-OBJECTS>
        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWrp9EJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-1">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 1</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The traffic light system should start in the TrafficRed state.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>TrafficRed</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-2">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 2</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The traffic light should stay red for a duration equal to or greater than ClearIntersectionTime seconds.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>TrafficRed</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>[t_seconds > ClearIntersectionTime]</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-3">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 3</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>After the red light duration, the light transitions to TrafficGreen.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>TrafficGreen</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>SetTrafficLightGreen()</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-4">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 4</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The traffic light should stay green for a duration equal to or greater than LightGreenTime seconds.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>TrafficGreen</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>[t_seconds > LightGreenTime]</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-5">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 5</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>After the green light duration, the light transitions to TrafficYellow.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>TrafficYellow</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>SetTrafficLightTellow()</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-6">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 6</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The traffic light should stay yellow for a duration equal to or greater than LightYellowTime seconds.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>TrafficYellow</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>[t_seconds > LightYellowTime]</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-7">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 7</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>After the yellow light duration, the light transitions back to TrafficRed.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>TrafficRed</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-8">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 8</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The pedestrian light system should start in the PedestrianRed state.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>PedestrianRed</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-9">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 9</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The pedestrian light should stay green for a duration equal to or greater than PedestrianWalkingTime seconds.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>PedestrianGreen</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>[t_seconds > PedestrianWalkingTime]</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-10">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 10</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>After the green light duration, the light transitions to PedestrianFlickering.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>PedestrianFlickering</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>SetPedestrianLightFlickering()</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-11">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 11</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The pedestrian light should flicker for a duration equal to or greater than PedestrianFlickeringTime seconds.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>PedestrianFlickering</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>[t_seconds > PedestrianFlickeringTime]</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-12">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 12</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>After the flickering duration, the light transitions to PedestrianRed.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>PedestrianRed</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>SetPedestrianLightRed()</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-13">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 13</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The pedestrian light should stay red while the traffic light is not in the TrafficRed state to ensure pedestrian safety.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>PedestrianRed</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-14">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 14</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The traffic light and pedestrian light systems must be synchronized to ensure pedestrian safety.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-15">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 15</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The pedestrian light should turn green only when the traffic light is red, ensuring no vehicles are crossing.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="state">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>PedestrianGreen</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="condition">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>SetPedestrianLightGreen()</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-16">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 16</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>The system must maintain accurate timing based on t.Seconds for transitions between states.</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>

        <SPEC-OBJECT
            IDENTIFIER="_xen_QMkhEee8KsfWfdasfqeEJQ"
            LAST-CHANGE="2024-10-02T15:44:36.000+02:00"
            LONG-NAME="Requirement-17">
          <VALUES>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML THE-ATTRIBUTE="description">
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Requirement 17</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
            <ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
              <THE-VALUE>
                <xhtml:div>Each transition should be triggered once the corresponding time has passed (e.g., ClearIntersectionTime, PedestrianWalkingTime, etc.).</xhtml:div>
              </THE-VALUE>
            </ATTRIBUTE-VALUE-XHTML>
          </VALUES>
        </SPEC-OBJECT>
        
      </SPEC-OBJECTS>
    </REQ-IF-CONTENT>
  </CORE-CONTENT>
  <TOOL-EXTENSIONS/>
</REQ-IF>


Feature File:
Feature: Enhanced Traffic Light and Pedestrian Light System

  The system controls the traffic and pedestrian lights at an intersection, ensuring synchronization and safety.

  @REQ-001
  Scenario: Traffic light system starts in red light
    Given the traffic light system starts
    When the system initializes
    Then the traffic light should be red

  @REQ-008
  Scenario: Pedestrian light system starts in red light
    Given the pedestrian light system starts
    When the system initializes
    Then the pedestrian light should be red

  @REQ-002
  Scenario Outline: Traffic light remains red for a specified duration
    Given the traffic light is red
    And the time since it turned red is <ElapsedTime> seconds
    When time is evaluated
    Then the traffic light should <ExpectedOutcome>

    Examples:
      | ElapsedTime | ExpectedOutcome     |
      | 5           | remain red          |
      | 10          | remain red          |
      | 15          | transition to green |

  @REQ-003
  Scenario: Traffic light transitions to green after red duration
    Given the traffic light is red
    And the time since it turned red is greater than the required red duration
    When the red light duration has passed
    Then the traffic light should transition to green

  @REQ-004
  Scenario Outline: Traffic light remains green for a specified duration
    Given the traffic light is green
    And the time since it turned green is <ElapsedTime> seconds
    When time is evaluated
    Then the traffic light should <ExpectedOutcome>

    Examples:
      | ElapsedTime | ExpectedOutcome      |
      | 5           | remain green         |
      | 20          | remain green         |
      | 25          | transition to yellow |

  @REQ-005
  Scenario: Traffic light transitions to yellow after green duration
    Given the traffic light is green
    And the time since it turned green is greater than the required green duration
    When the green light duration has passed
    Then the traffic light should transition to yellow

  @REQ-006
  Scenario Outline: Traffic light remains yellow for a specified duration
    Given the traffic light is yellow
    And the time since it turned yellow is <ElapsedTime> seconds
    When time is evaluated
    Then the traffic light should <ExpectedOutcome>

    Examples:
      | ElapsedTime | ExpectedOutcome   |
      | 2           | remain yellow     |
      | 4           | remain yellow     |
      | 6           | transition to red |

  @REQ-007
  Scenario: Traffic light transitions back to red after yellow duration
    Given the traffic light is yellow
    And the time since it turned yellow is greater than the required yellow duration
    When the yellow light duration has passed
    Then the traffic light should transition to red

  @REQ-015
  Scenario: Pedestrian light turns green when traffic light is red
    Given the traffic light is red
    When the pedestrian crossing phase begins
    Then the pedestrian light should turn green

  @REQ-009
  Scenario Outline: Pedestrian light remains green for a specified duration
    Given the pedestrian light is green
    And the time since it turned green is <ElapsedTime> seconds
    When time is evaluated
    Then the pedestrian light should <ExpectedOutcome>

    Examples:
      | ElapsedTime | ExpectedOutcome            |
      | 5           | remain green               |
      | 10          | remain green               |
      | 15          | transition to flashing red |

  @REQ-010
  Scenario: Pedestrian light transitions to flashing red after green duration
    Given the pedestrian light is green
    And the time since it turned green is greater than the required walking duration
    When the pedestrian green duration has passed
    Then the pedestrian light should transition to flashing red

  @REQ-011
  Scenario Outline: Pedestrian light flashes red for a specified duration
    Given the pedestrian light is flashing red
    And the time since it started flashing is <ElapsedTime> seconds
    When time is evaluated
    Then the pedestrian light should <ExpectedOutcome>

    Examples:
      | ElapsedTime | ExpectedOutcome   |
      | 2           | continue flashing |
      | 4           | continue flashing |
      | 6           | transition to red |

  @REQ-012
  Scenario: Pedestrian light transitions to red after flashing duration
    Given the pedestrian light is flashing red
    And the time since it started flashing is greater than the required flashing duration
    When the flashing duration has passed
    Then the pedestrian light should transition to red

  @REQ-013
  Scenario Outline: Pedestrian light stays red while traffic light is not red
    Given the traffic light is <TrafficLightState>
    When the pedestrian light state is evaluated
    Then the pedestrian light should be red

    Examples:
      | TrafficLightState |
      | green             |
      | yellow            |

  @REQ-014
  Scenario: Traffic light is red when pedestrian light is green
    Given the pedestrian light is green
    When the traffic light state is evaluated
    Then the traffic light should be red

  @REQ-014
  Scenario: Pedestrian and traffic lights are synchronized for safety
    Given the traffic light is <TrafficLightState>
    When the pedestrian light state is evaluated
    Then the pedestrian light should be <ExpectedPedestrianState>

    Examples:
      | TrafficLightState | ExpectedPedestrianState |
      | red               | green                   |
      | green             | red                     |
      | yellow            | red                     |

  @REQ-016
  Scenario: Traffic light transitions from red to green after 15 seconds
    Given the traffic light is red
    And the time since it turned red is greater than 15 seconds
    When the time is evaluated
    Then the traffic light should transition to green

  @REQ-016
  Scenario: Traffic light transitions from green to yellow after 20 seconds
    Given the traffic light is green
    And the time since it turned green is greater than 20 seconds
    When the time is evaluated
    Then the traffic light should transition to yellow

  @REQ-016
  Scenario: Traffic light transitions from yellow to red after 5 seconds
    Given the traffic light is yellow
    And the time since it turned yellow is greater than 5 seconds
    When the time is evaluated
    Then the traffic light should transition to red

  @REQ-016
  Scenario: Pedestrian light transitions from green to flashing red after 15 seconds
    Given the pedestrian light is green
    And the time since it turned green is greater than 15 seconds
    When the time is evaluated
    Then the pedestrian light should transition to flashing red

  @REQ-016
  Scenario: Pedestrian light transitions from flashing red to red after 5 seconds
    Given the pedestrian light is flashing red
    And the time since it started flashing is greater than 5 seconds
    When the time is evaluated
    Then the pedestrian light should transition to red

  @REQ-017
  Scenario Outline: Transitions are triggered after the corresponding time has passed
    Given the <CurrentState> has a duration of <DurationTime> seconds
    And the time since entering the state is <t_seconds> seconds
    When the time is evaluated
    Then the system should transition to <NextState>

    Examples:
      | CurrentState      | DurationTime | t_seconds | NextState         |
      | red light         | 15           | 16        | green light       |
      | green light       | 20           | 21        | yellow light      |
      | yellow light      | 5            | 6         | red light         |
      | pedestrian green  | 15           | 16        | flashing red      |
      | flashing red      | 5            | 6         | pedestrian red    |

Interactions.Message: Consider the functional coverage from the list of requirement, its edge cases and negative scenario. If possible, add those scenarios.

Cross check the response you gave with the original set of requirements. If there is/are scenario that is not in the requirement list, separate it and comment it using '#' at the beginning of the line. Indicate at the beginning that the commented scenario(s) is a recommendation.
Consider your response, if able, categorize the feature files and separate it based on its feature.

Ensure that the response you gave have valid JSON format with keys: "FeatureFiles" (Dictionary where the key is the SpecFlow feature file name). Make sure to output valid JSON, inside a string field you should only use single quotes, the double quotes are for begin/end of the field only. Make sure that the output can be read by JsonSerializer in C#. If the string contains tab, new line, or other invalid characters in JSON, use escape sequence.
